contents.text: More People Wal k to Better Healt h

contents.label: title
contents.text: Americans need mor e physical activity

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: 1. Less than half of all adults get the recommended amount of physical activity.

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: 2. More people are walking， but just how many depends on where they live， their health， and their age.

contents.label: section-title
contents.text: 3. People need safe， convenient places to walk.
